languages.text: "Ничего, вы оставляли нам щедрые чаевые, так что дела идут неплохо. Да и не только у "Амасекуса"... Сами знаете какая организация, которую я представляю, также не бедствует благодаря сделкам с вами. И мои партнеры желают внести свои инвестиции в вашу экспедицию. Припасы грузят в трюм вашего судна, а это — {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}персональный подарок{/d} вам от Миссии Касбаллики".

"It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."
languages.original_text: "Ничего, вы оставляли нам щедрые чаевые, так что дела идут неплохо. Да и не только у "Амасекуса"... Сами знаете какая организация, которую я представляю, также не бедствует благодаря сделкам с вами. И мои партнеры желают внести свои инвестиции в вашу экспедицию. Припасы грузят в трюм вашего судна, а это — {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}персональный подарок{/d} вам от Миссии Касбаллики".

languages.text: “不要紧，你的小费一直都很慷慨，所以我们没啥问题。而且，并不仅仅是我们烈酒修会……我所代表的组织，你也知道是哪个，也由于与你的贸易往来而蒸蒸日上。我的合伙人也希望能为你这场远征贡献一份力量。那些物资此刻正在运到船上，这是卡斯巴利卡集团送给你的{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}私人礼物{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."

traits.locale_text: “不要紧，您的小费一直都很慷慨，所以我们没啥问题。而且，并不仅仅是我们烈酒修会……我所代表的组织，您也知道是哪个，也由于与您的贸易往来而蒸蒸日上。我的合伙人也希望能为您这场远征贡献一份力量。那些物资此刻正在往船上装，这是卡斯巴利卡集团送给您的私人礼物。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「大丈夫です。沢山チップをいただきましたから、経営にはそれほど困っていません。アマセックだけの話ではなく…組織としても…どの組織の事かはおわかりかと思いますが…お取引のお陰で繁栄してきたのです。そうそう、私のビジネスパートナー達が、陛下の遠征に出資したいと言っています。物資は既に船倉に積まれていますわ。最後に、これはカスバリカ聖務団からの、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}私的な贈り物{/d}です」
languages.original_text: "It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."

traits.locale_text: 「大丈夫です。沢山チップをいただきましたから、経営にはそれほど困っていません。アマセックだけの話ではなく…組織としても…どの組織の事かはおわかりかと思いますが…お取引のお陰で繁栄してきたのです。そうそう、私のビジネスパートナー達が、陛下の遠征に出資したいと言っています。物資は既に船倉に積まれていますわ。最後に、これはカスバリカ聖務団からの、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}私的な贈り物{/d}です」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «No pasa nada. Ha sido generos{mf|o|a} con la propina, así que no nos va tan mal. Y no hablo solo del Amasecus... La organización a la que represento, ya sabe cuál, también ha prosperado gracias a su relación con usted, y a mis socios les gustaría contribuir con su expedición. Están cargando los suministros en la bodega de su nave. Es un {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}regalo{/d} de la misión Kasballica».
languages.original_text: "It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."

traits.locale_text: «No pasa nada. Ha sido generos{mf|o|a} con la propina, así que no nos va tan mal. Y no hablo solo del Amasecus... La organización a la que represento, ya sabe cuál, también ha prosperado gracias a su relación con usted, y a mis socios les gustaría contribuir con su expedición. Están cargando los suministros en la bodega de su nave. Es un regalo de la misión Kasballica».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ist schon gut. Ihr habt immer ein sehr großzügiges Trinkgeld gegeben, wir kommen also eine Weile über die Runden. Und mit 'wir' meine ich nicht nur das Amasecus ... Die Organisation, die ich repräsentiere ... ihr wisst, welche ich meine ... hat dank der Geschäfte mit Euch auch floriert. Und meine Partner möchten ihre ursprüngliche Investition nun für Eure Expedition spenden. Die Vorräte werden gerade in den Frachtraum Eures Schiffs gebracht, und dies ist noch ein {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}persönliches Geschenk{/d} von der Kasballica-Mission."
languages.original_text: "It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."

traits.locale_text: "Ist schon gut. Ihr habt immer ein sehr großzügiges Trinkgeld gegeben, wir kommen also eine Weile über die Runden. Und mit 'wir' meine ich nicht nur das Amasecus ... Die Organisation, die ich repräsentiere ... ihr wisst, welche ich meine ... hat dank der Geschäfte mit Euch auch floriert. Und meine Partner möchten ihre ursprüngliche Investition nun für Eure Expedition spenden. Die Vorräte werden gerade in den Frachtraum Eures Schiffs gebracht, und dies ist noch ein persönliches Geschenk von der Kasballica-Mission."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Ne vous en faites pas. Vous vous êtes {mf|montré|montrée} plus que {mf|généreux|généreuse}, donc on a de quoi faire. Et je ne parle pas seulement de l'Amasecus... L'organisation que je représente, vous savez laquelle, vous doit aussi sa prospérité. D'ailleurs, mes associés ont décidé d'investir dans votre expédition ; le matériel qu'ils vous fournissent est en train d'être chargé dans les cales de votre vaisseau en ce moment même. En supplément, veuillez accepter {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}ce petit cadeau{/d} de la part de la Mission de la Kasballica. »
languages.original_text: "It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous en faites pas. Vous vous êtes {mf|montré|montrée} plus que {mf|généreux|généreuse}, donc on a de quoi faire. Et je ne parle pas seulement de l'Amasecus... L'organisation que je représente, vous savez laquelle, vous doit aussi sa prospérité. D'ailleurs, mes associés ont décidé d'investir dans votre expédition ; le matériel qu'ils vous fournissent est en train d'être chargé dans les cales de votre vaisseau en ce moment même. En supplément, veuillez accepter ce petit cadeau de la part de la Mission de la Kasballica. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Önemli değil. Bahşişleriniz oldukça cömertti, sayelerinde pek kötü durumda sayılmayız. Sadece Amasekus'tan da bahsetmiyorum. Temsil ettiğim organizasyon da sizinle yaptıkları anlaşmalar sayesinde oldukça iyi bir duruma geldi. İş ortaklarım, keşif seferinize yatırım yaparak destek olmak istiyor. Erzaklar geminize yükleniyor, bu da Kasballica Misyonu'ndan {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}kişisel bir armağan{/d}."
languages.original_text: "It's all right. You've been a generous tipper, so we're not doing too badly. And not just we as in the Amasecus... The organisation I represent — you know which one — has also prospered thanks to its deals with you. And my partners would like to contribute their investments to your expedition. The supplies are being loaded into your ship's hold, and this is a {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}personal gift{/d} to you from the Kasballica Mission."

traits.locale_text: "Önemli değil. Bahşişleriniz oldukça cömertti, onlar sağ olsun pek kötü durumda sayılmayız. Sadece Amasekus'tan da bahsetmiyorum. Temsil ettiğim organizasyon da, siz hangisi olduğunu biliyorsunuz, sizinle yaptıkları anlaşmalar sayesinde oldukça iyi bir duruma geldi. İş ortaklarım, keşif seferinize yatırım yaparak destek olmak istiyorlar. Erzaklar geminize yükleniyor ve bu da Kasballica Misyonu'ndan {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Max}kişisel bir armağan{/d}."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
